org.traincontrol.marklin

Class MarklinControlStation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.traincontrol.marklin.MarklinControlStation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModelListener, ViewListener

    public class MarklinControlStation
extends java.lang.Object
implements ViewListener, ModelListener
    Main "station" class. Mimics CS2 functionality. This class waits for messages to come in, interprets them, and updates state
